metadata.name: The $1M Bitcoin Bet #1
metadata.creator: Bankless
metadata.description:
Balaji Srinivasan is an investor, founder, the former CTO of Coinbase, GP at a16z, and author of The Network State.

He’s making a  bold claim - that Bitcoin will reach $1M in 90 days due to the U.S. dollar going into hyperinflation. With these dire predictions and a track record of strong takes, we needed to hear him out. 

He’s pulling the fire alarm for the end of the fiat world. 

Will he be right? 

Artwork generated from the clip [1:32:44 - 1:32:57] “We want the decentralized center. We want to have the free world. And really this is the moment, so take everything that you guys have said seriously over the last 5 years. You got all the right concepts. And help your guys go Bankless.”
